item.description:
I'll be hosting another movie night in Billerica. This time we'll be watching Monty Python's "The Life of Brian" (thanks to Carl). Send me an email through meetup for my address and directions. I'll supply snacks and soft drinks, but please feel free to bring something to share if you wish.

The movie's running time is about 1:30. We'll start gathering at 7:30 and probably won't start the movie until 8:00 or so. It is OK to park in my driveway.
http://en.wikipedia.o...
http://www.imdb.com/t...
item.name: "Life of Brian" viewing
